summary: Logistics Suite S2-S5 testing completed successfully. All 10 API endpoints working correctly with expected demo data. All 4 UI pages load and function properly with filters, navigation, stats, and live tracking board.
critical_code_review_comments: MOCKED: All logistics service implementations (fleet-service.ts, driver-service.ts, job-service.ts, tracking-service.ts) use in-memory storage - not connected to real database
Demo data is well-structured with 10 vehicles (motorcycles, tricycles, vans, trucks), 6 drivers (5 active, 1 suspended), and 8 jobs (various statuses) for 'Swift Dispatch Co.' demo company in Lagos
All API endpoints follow consistent patterns with proper filtering, pagination, and stats
UI pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Job status update action works correctly and updates state in real-time
Live tracking board shows active jobs with priority sorting

success_rate.frontend: 100% (4/4 pages load correctly, all interactions work)

seed_data_creation: None - uses demo data from in-memory services
context_for_next_testing_agent: Logistics Suite S2-S5 is fully functional with demo data. All 10 API endpoints work without authentication. Demo company is 'Swift Dispatch Co.' in Lagos, Nigeria with Nigerian context (NGN currency, Nigerian phone numbers, Lagos addresses). Services use in-memory storage following same pattern as other suites (Civic, Education, Health, Hospitality).

backend_apis: GET /api/logistics-suite - Returns config, stats, and tracking board (PASSED)
GET /api/logistics-suite/fleet - Returns 10 demo vehicles with stats (PASSED)
GET /api/logistics-suite/drivers - Returns 6 demo drivers with stats (PASSED)
GET /api/logistics-suite/jobs - Returns 8 demo jobs with stats (PASSED)
GET /api/logistics-suite/tracking - Returns tracking board with 3 active jobs (PASSED)
Data integrity: Job assignment data verified (PASSED)
frontend_pages: /logistics-suite/admin - Dashboard with stats (5 active jobs, 3 drivers active, ₦3,500 revenue), Fleet/Drivers/Jobs/Quick Actions cards, Live Tracking board with 3 active jobs
/logistics-suite/fleet - Fleet page with 10 vehicles, type/status filters, stats bar (4 available, 3 in use, 1 maintenance, 33% utilization)
/logistics-suite/drivers - Drivers page with 6 drivers, search input, status filter, stats bar (1 available, 3 on trip, 1 off duty, 1 suspended, 4.6 avg rating)
/logistics-suite/jobs - Jobs page with 8 jobs, status/priority filters, stats bar (5 active, 2 pending, 1 completed, ₦3,500 revenue), view job dialog
ui_interactions: View Fleet button - Navigates to fleet page (PASSED)
View Drivers button - Navigates to drivers page (PASSED)
View Jobs button - Navigates to jobs page (PASSED)
Back button - Returns to dashboard from all pages (PASSED)
View Job button - Opens job details dialog (PASSED)

mocked_apis_note: MOCKED: All logistics service implementations use in-memory storage and return demo/stub data. This is intentional as the services follow the same pattern as Civic, Education, Health, and Hospitality suites. Data resets on page refresh.
